name: kangaroo12
description: The KangarooTwelve cryptographic fast hash algorithm in pure JavaScript.

scripts.build: babel --no-babelrc --presets @babel/preset-env --no-highlight-code --no-comments --compact true --minified --source-maps false --out-dir lib --delete-dir-on-start --only '**/index.js' src && cp -vf package.json package-lock.json yarn.lock README.md LICENSE lib/
